dev-3.x.name: drupal/drd

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-3.x.description: Dashboard to monitor and manage any number of remote Drupal 6, 7 or 8 sites

suggest.drupal/extlink: Allows to open external links in new tabs/windows.
suggest.drupal/hacked: Validate each project if it got changed compared to the original code from drupal.org.
suggest.drupal/real_aes: Encryption method for the encrypt module.
suggest.drupal/security_review: Site security and configuration review module.
suggest.drupal/console: CLI to use and optionally automate DRD actions.
suggest.drush/drush: Another CLI to use and optionally automate DRD actions.
